name: Feature_4431

ChangePackageDescription.value: Translation Review with WF and UI

items.name: Translation Review UI
items.instruction: Impact analysis not available. Verify linked business rules and workflows exist on target system plus everything used for configuration.

<STEP-ProductInformation ContextID="Context1"  WorkspaceID="Main"  ExportTime="2024-05-15 13:35:14"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeGroup ID="Marketing" ShowInWorkbench="true" ManuallySorted="false" ParentID="Attribute group root">
    <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Product Descriptions</Name>
  </AttributeGroup>
  </AttributeGroupList>

  <AttributeList>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet01" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Bullet01</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="550" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">Provide a single product selling feature (255 character limit). Use the categorization path to help you select the proper Data Standard</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet05" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">

      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="550" InputMask=""/>

      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet07" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">

      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet09" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Bullet09</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="1000" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet10" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Bullet10</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="1000" InputMask=""/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="MarketingCopy" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Marketing Description</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="1500" InputMask=""/>
      <DimensionLink DimensionID="Language"/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">Provide the customer with important details about your product in 3 or more sentences (1500 character limit).  Use the categorization path to help you select the proper Data Standard.</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="GoldenRecords"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet03" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Bullet03</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="2000" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">Provide a single product selling feature (255 character limit). Use the categorization path to help you select the proper Data Standard</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet08" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Bullet08</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="1000" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">List a product feature. If you use portions of your marketing copy to create bullet copy, vary your word choice. DO NOT include bullet characters (they are automatically added), DO NOT exceed 255 characters, DO NOT include rebate information here."</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet04" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Bullet04</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="600" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">Provide a single product selling feature (255 character limit). Use the categorization path to help you select the proper Data Standard</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet02" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Bullet02</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="650" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">Provide a single product selling feature (255 character limit). Use the categorization path to help you select the proper Data Standard</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="ItemBulletCalc" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="true" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ItemBulletCalc</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="100" InputMask=""/>
      <ValueTemplate><derive expr="value('Bullet05')"/></ValueTemplate>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </Attribute>

    <Attribute ID="Bullet06" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="true" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Bullet06</Name>
      <Validation BaseType="text" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="2000" InputMask=""/>
      <MetaData>
        <Value AttributeID="27715ad5-b32c-46de-9819-a6f4d2916ef9">yes! here is a <lt/>a href="http://www.google.com"<gt/>link<lt/>/a<gt/></Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Family"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Variant"/>
    </Attribute>

  </AttributeList>

  <DataContainerTypes>
    <DataContainerType ID="ELFRContainer" MultiValued="false" Inherited="false" Restricted="false" Mandatory="false">
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">ELFRContainer</Name>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Marketing"/>
      <AttributeLink AttributeID="URL"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Item"/>
    </DataContainerType>
  </DataContainerTypes>

  <STEPWorkflows/>

  <PortalConfigurations>
    <PortalConfiguration ID="TranslationReviewUI">

<!-- Definition:
<portal-config portalId="customerportal" xmlns="http://stibosystems.com/step/portal-config" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <screens>
    <loginscreen>
      <parameter id="PortalTitle" value="STEP Web UI"/>
    </loginscreen>
    <screen id="Name and ID" type="NodeDetails">
      <component id="Main" type="NodeEditor">
        <parameter id="LabelLayout" value="LEFT"/>
        <parameter-list id="Rows">
          <component id="Rows" type="IdValue">
            <parameter id="CssClass" value="stibo-IdValue"/>
            <parameter id="Label" value="i18n.stibo.IdValue.Label"/>
          </component>
          <component id="Rows" type="NameValue">
            <parameter id="CssClass" value="stibo-NameValue"/>
            <parameter id="Label" value="i18n.stibo.NameValue.Label"/>
            <parameter id="Mandatory" value="false"/>
            <parameter id="ReadOnly" value="false"/>
          </component>
        </parameter-list>
      </component>
      <parameter id="EnforceValidity" value="false"/>
      <parameter id="ShowWarning" value="false"/>
      <parameter id="Title" value="Name and ID"/>
    </screen>
    <screen id="homepage" type="HomePage">
      <parameter id="CssClass" value="stibo-HomePage"/>
      <parameter id="DisableTitle" value="false"/>
      <parameter id="PagingEnabled" value="false"/>
      <parameter id="Title" value="Translation & Translation Review"/>
      <parameter-list id="Content">
        <component id="Content" type="WidgetGrid">
          <parameter-list id="Widgets">
            <component id="Widgets" type="TextWidget">
              <parameter id="CssClass" value="stb-staticText"/>
              <parameter id="DoubleWidth" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="Text" value="Click the gear icon in the corner bar to begin configuring the Web UI. For help and guidance on configuring Web UIs, see the Web User Interfaces section of the online help."/>
              <parameter id="Title" value="Welcome"/>
            </component>
            <component id="Widgets" type="UserWidget">
              <parameter id="Title" value="i18n.stibo.UserWidgetServerComponent.Title"/>
              <parameter id="UserDetailsScreen" value="userdetails"/>
            </component>
            <component id="Widgets" type="StatusSelectorHomepageWidget">
              <parameter id="AutoRefreshInterval" value="0"/>
              <parameter id="DefaultTaskMode" value="Group"/>
              <parameter id="DoubleWidth" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="InitiateLabel" value="Initiate"/>
              <parameter id="ResultScreen" value="Name and ID"/>
              <parameter id="ShowAll" value="true"/>
              <parameter id="ShowCollectionFilter" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="ShowGroup" value="true"/>
              <parameter id="ShowInitiate" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="ShowStatusFlagHeaders" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="ShowTotal" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="ShowUser" value="true"/>
              <parameter id="StatusFlagsEnabled" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="TotalLabel" value="Total"/>
              <parameter id="UseContentIndicator" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="Workflow" value="TranslationReviewWF"/>
              <parameter-list id="States">
                <parameter value="Initial"/>
                <parameter value="Translation"/>
              </parameter-list>
            </component>
          </parameter-list>
        </component>
      </parameter-list>
    </screen>
    <screen id="login" type="LoginScreen"/>
    <screen id="main" type="Main">
      <parameter id="DefaultSidePanel" value="SHOWN"/>
      <parameter id="Resizeable" value="true"/>
      <parameter-list id="Left">
        <component id="Left" type="PrimaryNavigation">
          <parameter-list id="MenuItems">
            <component id="MenuItems" type="GlobalNavigationSearch">
              <parameter id="Label" value="Global Search"/>
              <parameter-list id="SearchConfigurations">
                <component id="SearchConfigurations" type="GlobalNavigationSearchConfiguration">
                  <parameter id="Title" value="Name/Id/Attributes"/>
                  <parameter-list id="SearchPlugins">
                    <component id="SearchPlugins" type="NameOrIdOrAttributes">
                      <parameter id="ForceIDNameSearch" value="false"/>
                      <parameter id="SearchInDataContainers" value="false"/>
                    </component>
                  </parameter-list>
                </component>
              </parameter-list>
            </component>
            <component id="MenuItems" type="TreeItem">
              <parameter id="HideLeaves" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="Icon" value="account_tree"/>
              <parameter id="Label" value="i18n.stibo.webui.primarynavigation.TreeItem.Label"/>
              <parameter id="ShowLeaves" value="false"/>
              <parameter id="showRecycle" value="false"/>
            </component>
          </parameter-list>
        </component>
      </parameter-list>
      <parameter-list id="Mappings">
        <component id="Mappings" type="ScreenMapping">
          <parameter id="Screen" value="userdetails"/>
          <parameter-list id="Conditions">
            <component id="Conditions" type="UserCondition"/>
          </parameter-list>
        </component>
        <component id="Mappings" type="ScreenMapping">
          <parameter id="Screen" value="Name and ID"/>
          <parameter-list id="Conditions">
            <component id="Conditions" type="AlwaysTrueCondition"/>
          </parameter-list>
        </component>
      </parameter-list>
    </screen>
    <screen id="userdetails" type="UserDetails">
      <component id="Buttons" type="Buttons">
        <parameter-list id="Actions">
          <component type="SaveAction">
            <parameter id="CssClass" value="SaveButton"/>
          </component>
          <component type="ResetAction">
            <parameter id="CssClass" value="ResetButton"/>
          </component>
        </parameter-list>
      </component>
      <component id="Main" type="NodeEditor">
        <parameter-list id="Rows">
          <component id="UserId" type="IdValue">
            <parameter id="Label" value="User ID"/>
          </component>
          <component id="UserEmail" type="UserEmail">
            <parameter id="Label" value="Email Address"/>
            <parameter id="Mandatory" value="True"/>
          </component>
          <component id="UserPassword" type="UserPassword">
            <parameter id="NewPasswordLabel" value="New password"/>
            <parameter id="OldPasswordLabel" value="Old password"/>
            <parameter id="RepeatPasswordLabel" value="Repeat new password"/>
          </component>
        </parameter-list>
      </component>
    </screen>
  </screens>
  <theme/>
</portal-config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="WebUIs"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">Translation Review UI</Name>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
    </PortalConfiguration>
  </PortalConfigurations>
</STEP-ProductInformation>
